mdRecord.dcterms:title: Copy photograph - Visit of President Benjamin Harrison and his official party, May 1889
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Dillon, Luke C., 1836-1904
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Luke C. Dillon, Authorized Photographer, Office at Pullman's Gallery, 935 Penna. Avenue, Washington City, D. C.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Black and white copy photograph of visit of President Benjamin Harrison and guests on the southeast lawn. Original photograph taken by Luke C. Dillon as printed on the border. The photograph is signed, "Compliments of Levi P. Morton, 1889." Morton served as Harrison's Vice President from 1889-1893.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Harrison, Benjamin 1833-1901
Morton, Levi P. (Levi Parsons), 1824-1920
